# Objective
Compare results of your local ANTs processing to a set of reference results
```{r fig.width=8, fig.height=4, echo=FALSE}
library(ANTsR)
ptrainimg<-as.matrix(antsImageRead("sccanTutorial/data/pbac_train_img.mha",2))
ptestimg<-as.matrix(antsImageRead("sccanTutorial/data/pbac_test_img.mha",2))
mask<-antsImageRead("sccanTutorial/data/gmask.nii.gz",3)
ptraincog<-read.csv("sccanTutorial/data/pbac_train_cog.csv")
ptestcog<-read.csv("sccanTutorial/data/pbac_test_cog.csv")
```
